titles.title: States Choose Life Act of 2023
States Choose Life Act of 2023
To amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to prohibit requiring a recipient or subrecipient of funds to provide referrals for abortion, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary:
States Choose Life Act of 2023
This bill prohibits the Department of Health and Human Services from requiring recipients of Title X Family Planning Grants to provide (1) referrals for pregnancy termination, or (2) information or counseling on options for pregnancy termination that are unlawful in the state where the family planning services are offered.
